title: AutoID  ID自动调整
author: maxsunma
txt_content:
Auto ID对于目前市面上的每一个MOD都十分有效。目前这个MOD正在前期的开发中，作者正在下很大的一盘棋……
只要装了Auto ID，你就不再需要担心多个MOD之间的ID冲突问题了。这将给MOD安装的过程带来革命，完全消除臭名昭著的，由于两个MOD的Block ID相同而产生的黑屏bug.
Auto ID is a very neat/useful tool for each/every mod-user/modder in the WORLD. Currently this mod is still in early development, and has VERY big plans ahead. With Auto ID installed, you no longer have to worry about ID conflicts when installing multiple mods. This will drastically improve the mod installation process, as well as completely eliminate the NOTORIOUS BLACK SCREEN error that occurs when two mods use the same Block ID.



警告：安装MOD时请备份你的存档。尽管作者本人没发生过任何问题，但是确实有一个常见的问题存在。某些Block的ID并不保持静态，Auto ID会更换那些ID，并使世界中的方块错乱。作者将在下个版本解决这个问题。
WARNING: When using any mod, but especially AUTO ID, you must make sure you backup your saves before installing this mod. I, personally, have not experienced any issues with corruption; however, there is a common bug in which certain block ids don't stay static. This means that if you build a world with certain mods, Auto ID(only sometimes) switches ids, resulting in a world with blocks that aren't supposed to be there. The next update that I, caspur, create will fix this issue.



由于我自己装的MOD不多，所以对这个MOD的功能测试肯定还不完全……只能在这召唤更多小白鼠了~~
作者不久就会更新1.2版，记得随时关注哦。







AutoID1.1_1.6.6.zip
